Trade/Device Name(s): Great Basin Toxigenic C. difficile Direct Test
Submitter Information: Vela Operations USA (DBA Great Basin Scientific)
Regulation Name(s): Clostridium difficile toxin gene amplification assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Great Basin Toxigenic C. difficile Direct Test for qualitative molecular detection of toxigenic Clostridioides difficile in stool using automated PCR and chip-based optical analysis
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for detection of toxigenic Clostridioides difficile in unformed stool from patients suspected of infection, using PCR to detect toxin gene (tcdB), intended as an aid in the diagnosis of C. difficile infection in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors
